# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of changes.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring (no functional changes)

## Related Issues
Fixes #(issue number)

## Checklist
Before submitting this PR, please ensure:

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-reviewed my code for obvious errors
- [ ] Added XML documentation for public APIs
- [ ] No new compiler warnings introduced

### Testing
- [ ] Tested on Windows (required)
- [ ] Tested light and dark themes
- [ ] Tested with sample training run files
- [ ] Tested keyboard shortcuts still work

### Documentation
- [ ] Updated README.md if needed
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md with changes
- [ ] Updated QUICK_REFERENCE.md if keyboard shortcuts changed

If this PR includes UI changes, please add before/after screenshots:

**After:**


## Additional Notes
Any additional information reviewers should know.
